id.description: Unique identifier for the status list

credentialConfigurationId.description: Credential configuration ID to bind this list exclusively to. Leave empty for a shared list.

certId.description: Certificate ID to use for signing. Leave empty to use the tenant's default StatusList certificate.

capacity.description: Capacity of the status list. If not provided, uses tenant or global defaults.

bits.description: Bits per status value. If not provided, uses tenant or global defaults.
